summary: The diff shows only two files modified: backend/main.mo (with truncated content showing type definitions but no functional changes related to the requirements) and project_state.json (which only records the requirements as 'pending' feature requests). None of REQ-1, REQ-2, or REQ-3 have been actually implemented â€” no frontend files were modified, no approval data mapping was fixed, no file upload pipeline was corrected, and no filter bar was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit and fix approvals data mapping in the frontend Admin Dashboard: ensure all fields of each approval object are correctly destructured and rendered, remove truncation logic, and keep the list in sync after mutations.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files were modified in the diff. The approvals tab UI, data mapping, and truncation logic remain untouched. project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix file upload pipeline in ClientDeliverableForm.tsx, CreateToDoForm.tsx, ClientCreateToDoForm.tsx for correct ArrayBuffer/Uint8Array handling, and fix download reconstruction in DocumentTable.tsx, ComplianceAdminToDoList.tsx to preserve MIME type and byte integrity.
missing_requirements.reason: None of the specified frontend files (ClientDeliverableForm.tsx, CreateToDoForm.tsx, ClientCreateToDoForm.tsx, DocumentTable.tsx, ComplianceAdminToDoList.tsx) were modified. project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a persistent filter bar to DocumentTable.tsx and the Documents tabs of Admin Dashboard and Client Portal with document type filter, date range pickers, free-text name search, and sort controls that apply reactively client-side.
missing_requirements.reason: DocumentTable.tsx and any Documents tab components were not modified in the diff. No filter bar implementation is present. project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.
